review: I'm pleased with the roku 3500R streaming stick, I'm using them on two tvs.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I have only had for a week but so far am happy with it.  It was very easy to set up. I ended up picking it over the Roku 3 as I do not ever use head phones and did not see the point in paying for that feature.
author: Abigal

review: Purchased as a gift. Working as expected.
author: Mary J

review: This is one of the better media sticks.  It has extra channels that Chromecast will not use.  I get PBS (for Downton Abbey, Amazon Prime, Netflix.  Those are my biggest users.  It also features "M-Go", a movie channel you can buy movies from.  What sets this one apart from the rest (Vudu, etc.) is that it awards points for either buying or renting movies through them. About every fourth movie, you can redeem your points and rent for free. It is very cool.  Their customer service is also great and very responsive.The only trouble I have encountered is two things: 1. the first Roku remote stopped working so I got a new Roku. 2. I cannot sync my iPhone Roku app to use it as a remote.  If I figure that out, it should be good to go from there.
author: JR "daddy0"
